page.title: 07CUSTOMS - OPEN MARKET
page.content: It's Saturday morning and I get up at 6.OO a.m. to help my mother on the two{market stalls }she owns. I get a cup of coffee and slice of toast and marmalade jam with orange peel in it. Then I wash my cup and plate and help mummy make up the flasks and sandwiches. About quarter to seven we go down to the market. We get all the {handbags}out of the cardboard boxes and stand them on the stall. We sell as much as we can, then we have a pie from the shop and eat it. After that we pack all the bags away and go home about 17.OO hours and watch television until 2O.OO hours. Then we go out to the Indian Take-away and get a curry. I get a Madras and my mum and dad get Vindaloo. I eat this, help with the dishes and go to bed. Jnnyfer Walker.
